edu.harvard.util.graph.layout

Class Graphviz

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.util.graph.layout.Graphviz
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancelable, ExternalFileConverter, FileConverter, GraphLayoutAlgorithm, HasWizardPanelConfigGUI, XMLSerializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Graphviz
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalFileConverter, Cancelable, GraphLayoutAlgorithm, java.lang.Cloneable, HasWizardPanelConfigGUI, XMLSerializable
    An interface to Graphviz
    Author:
    Peter Macko
